text: Amazing school campus great place to go after graduating from acs primary must check out the student hub! It contains pool table foosball darts and aircon great place to come after school to do homework and discuss canteen has a large variety of different cultural dishes and delicacies. After school you could walk over to balmoral plaza to eat and drink at coffee bean and tea leaf or 7-eleven there is also a bustop and mrt near by to go home easily i highly recommend sending your son to this school, I personally have many fond memories with my friends in this school. I will always cherish the friendships i made here!
For the small group  of elitist people who feel they are better than others.The school should do something about this
Wooooo best school ever I love it

As the Scourge Of Bukit Timah opened his domain, Angroxsis chuckled. "Are you strong because you eat fire or do you eat fire because your strong?" "If Angroxsis casts those spheres I may have a little trouble. But would you lose? Nah, I'd Win." As Angroxsis casted his signature spell, Enlightening spheres, The Scourge Of Bukit Timah shrank back in fear. "Stand proud Scourge," Angroxsis said, "You were strong"
Great campus too bad management as of 2012 was terrible ahem. If the Mrs aw is still the vp then good luck to your kids. A literal child bully
